column4: Any 2.5mm dimeter rod/metal coat hanger, or the listed PN
Vertiq 23-06 Motor Module M5 Prop Adapter

column7: List PN is not required, any washer will do as long as it doesn’t interfere with anything
Hole ID must be increased to 4mm to all 12 wires through the bolt
Configured for use with two motors, but one should also work - A replacement motor will need to take its place
